text:
Karen Percy is (born October 10, 1966) in Banff, Alberta is a Canadian Olympic skier. She had her Olympic debut in 1988. She was in Canada’s Sports Hall of Fame in the year 1994.We went to be on the Canadian Olympic Hall of Fame the next year. She also became a member of the Order of Canada in 1988.
In 2005, she got into the Banff Sports Hall of Fame.
